text: waldhyn jawu min almuminin min baed al'ansar walmuhajirin al'awalin yqwlwn: rabana aghfir lana dhnwbna, waghfir l'ikhwanna fi aldiyn aladhin sabaquna bal'iyman, wala tajeal fi qulubina hsdana whqdana li'ahad min 'ahl al'iyman, rabana 'iinak rawuwf bebadk, rahim bhm. wafi alayat dlalt ealaa 'anah yanbaghi llmslm 'an yadhakar salafuh bkhyr, wayadeu lhm, wa'ana yuhibu shabt rasul allh, salaa allah ealayh wslm, wydhkrhm bkhyr, wytrda enhm
